name: OperationsSchedulesFromDateTimeByOriginAndDestinationGet
description: Scheduled flights between given airports on a given date.

fromDateTime.description: Local departure date and optionally departure time (YYYY-MM-DD or YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm). When not provided, time is assumed to be 00:01

Accept.description: http header: application/json or application/xml (Acceptable values are: "application/json", "application/xml")

directFlights.description: Show only direct flights (false=0, true=1). Default is false

limit.description: Number of records returned per request. Defaults to 20, maximum is 100 (if a value bigger than 100 is given, 100 will be taken)

offset.description: Number of records skipped. Defaults to 0
